mapper.sql: ID, NAME, YEAR, MOBILE, AUDITORS, INDEX, TOTAL_ASSETS, TOTAL_LIABILITIES, TOTAL_NET_ASSETS, TAKING, AUDIT_OPINION, LIABILITIES_LIST, PROFIT_LIST, CASH_FLOW_STATEMENT, CHANGE_LIST, SUPPLIER_ID, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT
mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_FINANCE (ID, NAME, YEAR, MOBILE, AUDITORS, INDEX, TOTAL_ASSETS, TOTAL_LIABILITIES, TOTAL_NET_ASSETS, TAKING, AUDIT_OPINION, LIABILITIES_LIST, PROFIT_LIST, CASH_FLOW_STATEMENT, CHANGE_LIST, SUPPLIER_ID, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT ) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{year}, #{mobile}, #{auditors}, #{index}, #{totalAssets}, #{totalLiabilities}, #{totalNetAssets}, #{taking}, #{auditOpinion}, #{liabilitiesList}, #{profitList}, #{cashFlowStatement}, #{changeList}, #{supplierId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )

mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_FINANCE
NAME = #{name},
YEAR = #{year},
MOBILE = #{mobile},
AUDITORS = #{auditors},
INDEX = #{index},
TOTAL_ASSETS = #{totalAssets},
TOTAL_LIABILITIES = #{totalLiabilities},
TOTAL_NET_ASSETS = #{totalNetAssets},
TAKING = #{taking},
AUDIT_OPINION = #{auditOpinion},
LIABILITIES_LIST = #{liabilitiesList},
PROFIT_LIST = #{profitList},
CASH_FLOW_STATEMENT = #{cashFlowStatement},
CHANGE_LIST = #{changeList},
SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt},
where ID = #{id}

update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_FINANCE set NAME = #{name}, YEAR = #{year}, MOBILE = #{mobile}, AUDITORS = #{auditors}, INDEX = #{index}, TOTAL_ASSETS = #{totalAssets}, TOTAL_LIABILITIES = #{totalLiabilities}, TOTAL_NET_ASSETS = #{totalNetAssets}, TAKING = #{taking}, AUDIT_OPINION = #{auditOpinion}, LIABILITIES_LIST = #{liabilitiesList}, PROFIT_LIST = #{profitList}, CASH_FLOW_STATEMENT = #{cashFlowStatement}, CHANGE_LIST = #{changeList}, SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt} where ID = #{id}
